title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed correctly.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy is not displayed correctly when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed correctly when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a binary project in the IDE.
2. Select a file within the binary project.
3. Press the F4 key to open the scoped type hierarchy.
4. Observe that the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed correctly.
